reviewText:
This is one of the Nelvana episodes of the care bears, in fact it is the 3rd Nelvana episode. this is a great episode because it shows people that cheaters never win and that cheating usually ends up taking more time than just going that extra mile. Just to let you know, you can find this episode of the care bears on the DVD entitled: Adventures in care-a-lot. the dvd version comes with 3 other episodes including:

Care-a-lot's Birthday- Hugs and Tugs are kidnapped and the care bears launch a rescue mission to save their home

Grumpy's 3 wishes- A 8-leaf clover brings grumpy bear 3 wishes.

Home Sweet Homeless- A flood forces the care bear cousins to move out of the forest of feelings and into care-a-lot.

Please note, this VHS only has the one Episode on it. for the other episodes you'll have to get the dvd.
